entities.name: second war
entities.description: The second war is mentioned at the beginning of the text.

entities.name: dormitory
entities.description: Harry is sprinting out of the dormitory to go somewhere else.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a person who calls after Harry as he runs by.

entities.name: feast
entities.description: The feast is mentioned as an event that is about to start.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: Harry thinks that everyone must be in the Great Hall for the feast.

entities.name: charms classroom
entities.description: Harry comes to a halt outside his Charms classroom.

relationships.description: Harry has no intention of going to the feast.
The Fat Lady mentions that the feast is about to start.
Harry thinks that everyone must be in the Great Hall for the feast.
